batchStoreEncryptedData(string[],uint256.details: Store multiple encrypted data entries in a batch

params.localTimestamps: Array of original timestamps from local storage

clearMyData().details: Clear all data for the caller (emergency function)

getEncryptedData(address).details: Get all encrypted data for a user

getEncryptedDataAfterTimestamp(address,u.details: Get entries stored after a specific timestamp

params.afterTimestamp: Only return entries stored after this timestamp

getEncryptedDataRange(address,uint256,ui.details: Get encrypted data for a user within a range

returns.entries: Array of encrypted entries in the specified range

getLastSyncTimestamp(address).details: Get the last sync timestamp for a user

getMyShares().details: Get all data packages shared by the caller

getReceivedShareCount(address).details: Get the total number of shares received by a user

getShareCount(address).details: Get the total number of shares created by a user

getSharedByUser(address).details: Get data packages shared by a specific user (public for transparency)

getSharedWithMe().details: Get all data packages shared with the caller

getSharedWithUser(address).details: Get data packages shared with a specific user (public for transparency)

getUserEntryCount(address).details: Get the total number of entries for a user

shareData(address,string,uint8).details: Share encrypted data with another user

params.ipfsHash: The IPFS hash of the encrypted data package
params.recipient: The address of the user to share data with

storeEncryptedData(string,uint256).details: Store a single encrypted data entry for the caller

params.localTimestamp: The original timestamp from local storage
